column4: renato: sorry, I am a newbie, but isn't Ubuntu Breezy utf-8 by default? And why does convmv not change my  and  characters to the same characters?
yes, ubuntu comes with utf-8 set by default
have I understood this correctly: when moving my files from my vfat-partition to my Ubuntu partition, they automatically become utf-8??
i am not sure if that happens
